entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
